ComicInfo.Title: Seed Of Destruction - Part II: Moonstruck
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev78 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-04-09 14:03:52. [Issue ID 36701]
ComicInfo.Tags: the X-O Commando platoon,Rexo,Spider Aliens,Randy Cartier (Security Chief of Orb Industries),X-O Manowar [Aric],Ken Clarkson
ComicInfo.Summary:
From fitful dreams, Aric wakes to discover the good skin is taking him into the far reaches of space! There Rexo and the last of Aric's one-time captors lie in wait, desperate to claim the Manowar armor as their own!
Above the alien moonbase, Aric learns why he was brought here against his will. It seems the Armor has a Spore from which a Starship can be grown -- and the aliens want it! Aric enters the base and confronts Rexo, who claims the Good Skin's true name is Shanhara. When Rexo tries to take the Spore, Aric slays him and prepares to depart. But a squad of armored aliens snare him in energy-webs and drag him back to the base!
1st appearance:
- Randy Cartier
